StringProperty.Name: GenerateOptions_
StringProperty.Description: Additional generate options can be specified here. These options will be appended to the PLCnCLI generate command. See "plcncli generate all --help" command for information about available options.

StringProperty.Name: DeployOptions_
StringProperty.Description: Additional deploy options can be specified here. These options will be appended to the PLCnCLI deploy command. See "plcncli deploy --help" command for information about available options.

BoolProperty.Name: DisablePLCnCLIGenerate
BoolProperty.Description: This option controlls whether the 'generate' step shall be omitted during build. Default is 'No'.

BoolProperty.Name: DisablePLCnCLIDeploy
BoolProperty.Description: This option controlls whether the 'deploy' step shall be omitted during build. Default is 'No'.

StringListProperty.Name: SourceFolders
StringListProperty.Description: If the project has source folders different from the standard folder 'src' then all folders have to be listed here, e.g.: src,otherfolder,andanother. Note that the folderstructure from the filesystem is relevant and not the solution explorer's structure.
